title: Drawing, "The Struggle between Hercules and the River God Achelous", 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, over traces of black chalk on light blue laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two men shown wrestling. Onlookers shown at left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Struggle between Hercules and the River God Achelous", 1813.
1813. Pen and brown ink, over traces of black chalk on light blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3229.
